com.mirth.connect.server.userutil

类 ACKGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mirth.connect.server.userutil.ACKGenerator

  • public class ACKGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows users to generate HL7 v2.x acknowledgments based on an inbound message, with a specified ACK code and custom text message. This class will not work as expected if the HL7 v2.x data type plugin is disabled or uninstalled.

    • 构造器概要

      已过时。

    • 方法详细资料

      • generateAckResponse

        public static java.lang.String generateAckResponse(java.lang.String message,
                                                   java.lang.String acknowledgementCode,
                                                   java.lang.String textMessage)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates an HL7 v2.x acknowledgment. Assumes that the inbound message is proper ER7, and uses the default format "yyyyMMddHHmmss" for the MSH.7 message date/time.
        参数:
        message - The inbound HL7 v2.x message to generate the ACK for.
        acknowledgementCode - The MSA.1 ACK code to use (e.g. AA, AR, AE).
        textMessage - The MSA.3 text message to use.
        返回:
        The generated HL7 v2.x acknowledgment.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateAckResponse

        public static java.lang.String generateAckResponse(java.lang.String message,
                                                   java.lang.String dataType,
                                                   java.lang.String acknowledgementCode,
                                                   java.lang.String textMessage,
                                                   java.lang.String dateFormat,
                                                   java.lang.String errorMessage)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        已过时。 This method is deprecated and will soon be removed. Please use generateAckResponse(message, isXML, acknowledgementCode, textMessage, dateFormat, errorMessage) instead.
        Generates an HL7 v2.x acknowledgment.
        参数:
        message - The inbound HL7 v2.x message to generate the ACK for.
        dataType - If "XML", assumes the inbound message is formatted in XML, and the acknowledgment returned will also be XML.
        acknowledgementCode - The MSA.1 ACK code to use (e.g. AA, AR, AE).
        textMessage - The MSA.3 text message to use.
        dateFormat - The date/time format used to generate a timestamp for the MSH.7 message date/time (e.g. "yyyyMMddHHmmss").
        errorMessage - The ERR.1 error message to use. If left blank, an ERR segment will not be generated.
        返回:
        The generated HL7 v2.x acknowledgment.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateAckResponse

        public static java.lang.String generateAckResponse(java.lang.String message,
                                                   boolean isXML,
                                                   java.lang.String acknowledgementCode,
                                                   java.lang.String textMessage,
                                                   java.lang.String dateFormat,
                                                   java.lang.String errorMessage)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates an HL7 v2.x acknowledgment.
        参数:
        message - The inbound HL7 v2.x message to generate the ACK for.
        isXML - If true, assumes the inbound message is formatted in XML, and the acknowledgment returned will also be XML.
        acknowledgementCode - The MSA.1 ACK code to use (e.g. AA, AR, AE).
        textMessage - The MSA.3 text message to use.
        dateFormat - The date/time format used to generate a timestamp for the MSH.7 message date/time (e.g. "yyyyMMddHHmmss").
        errorMessage - The ERR.1 error message to use. If left blank, an ERR segment will not be generated.
        返回:
        The generated HL7 v2.x acknowledgment.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
